skins.shipDescription: Cleveland-class Light Cruiser C Cleveland, Hull Number CL-55!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the big sister of the Cleveland-class... but I guess that's obvious from my name alone. I fought through the Battle of Renelle Island, the Battle of Empress Augusta Bay, plus many others, and I earned around 13 battle stars, so I'm pretty strong!
skins.acquisition: Pleasure meeting you, Commander! I'm Cleveland, a knight of the sea! Come on, time is money! We can't afford to take a break!
skins.login: Hey, Commander! You seem to be in a good mood today!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Never regret the choices you make!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Why do you call me "Clevebro"?! I'm a girl, just like the others!
skins.secretaryIdle3: You know, I like trees. Let's grow a bonsai, Commander!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You can't do this sorta stuff in public, Commander...

skins.shipDescription: Man, this is so embarrassing... C-Commander, w-w-what do you, umm, like, think of my d-d-d-dress...?
skins.acquisition: Man, this is so embarrassing... C-Commander, w-w-what do you, umm, like, think of my d-d-d-dress...?
skins.login: I was just thinking you'd be back soon, and here you are! Maybe we share a telepathic link through our hearts! Hehehe~?
skins.details: Anything I worry about? Nothing at all. ...Actually, I shouldn't keep things secret from you! Not that I could even if I wanted to. Hahahah!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Anything you wanna do, or anything on your mind? You can tell me anything?
skins.secretaryIdle2: How happy you make me feel? Hmm, I feel as happy as the ocean feels big, I guess? Hehehe~
skins.secretaryIdle3: You're worried about people meddling with us? Hehe, there's no point worrying about that stuff when we have each other!
skins.secretaryTouch: I've never cuddled with someone like this before... It might take some getting used to, but I still like it. Hehehe~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: N-no probs! I'm ready for this! So just go ahead and, umm, y-you know...

skins.shipDescription: There's room for two on this pumpkin. C'mon, hurry and get on... Ah, that reminds me! I've got some pumpkin pie as well. Wanna try some, Commander?
skins.acquisition: There's room for two on this pumpkin. C'mon, hurry and get on... Ah, that reminds me! I've got some pumpkin pie as well. Wanna try some, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Time is money, Commander! ... Or so I would say, but even I want to spend some of it every now and then.
skins.secretaryIdle3: If we the plow the fields now and add some fertilizer... then by next year's Halloween we can eat some homegrown pumpkins! Let's do it!
skins.secretaryTouch: Do you wanna try some of the pumpkin pie that Helena made?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Well made, don't you think? Heh, I've heard this thing can even harvest souls.

skins.shipDescription: Why am I stuck with this tuxedo when everyone else is wearing a dress?! ... Though it does feel slick, so I guess it's pretty nice. So, weren't we gonna go to the party, Commander? Then it's about time we head out!
skins.acquisition: Why am I stuck with this tuxedo when everyone else is wearing a dress?! ... Though it does feel slick, so I guess it's pretty nice. So, weren't we gonna go to the party, Commander? Then it's about time we head out!
skins.login: Ready yet, Commander? It's time to go to the party!
skins.details: Ah, don't you worry, Commander. Your invitation's got top priority to me.
skins.secretaryIdle1: You wanna come to the party too, Knight? All right... you're coming, too!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Quite a few people have asked me for a dance, but I'm not a great dancer... Commander, could ya help me learn the basics of dancing?
skins.secretaryIdle3: *Phew*... You wanna go for something to eat when the party's over, Commander? I'll treat you, so don't be shy! I mean come on, we're friends~
skins.secretaryTouch: What's up, Knight? ... A rose...? Just what I needed! Here, Commander. A little gift from me to you, darling.

skins.shipDescription: Good timing! I was just about to take my little buddy here out for a road trip! Commander, there's room for two if you want to come!
skins.acquisition: Good timing! I was just about to take my little buddy here out for a road trip! Commander, there's room for two if you want to come!
skins.login: Ready to go, Commander? We're about to go chase the wind!
skins.details: What kind of music do you like, Commander? I've gotta have the stuff that gets you pumped up.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I did this guy's paint job myself. Pretty sweet, huh? Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Don't let the size fool you. This little guy has some serious kick!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Even when we're out for a spin, we have to observe the traffic rules. Safety first, after all~
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you should pick out a bike too! Just leave the paint job to me, hehe!

skins.shipDescription: Happy New Year's, Commander! I heard everyone from the Sakura Empire was dressing like this, so... Hehehe, think this looks good on me? I thought I'd ask for your impression first, Commander.
skins.acquisition: Happy New Year's, Commander! I heard everyone from the Sakura Empire was dressing like this, so... Hehehe, think this looks good on me? I thought I'd ask for your impression first, Commander.
skins.login: Hehe, Commander, how about a hanetsuki match?
skins.details: Woahh... In the Sakura Empire, if you lose at a game of hanetsuki, they draw all over your face with a marker... Never knew that...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Next time, I won't lose to the Sendai sisters! That's why, hehe... Commander, glad you're going to be my practice partner!
skins.secretaryIdle2: The bonsai tree I planted last year doesn't seem to have grown much... I'll have to tend to it better this year.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's hard to move around in this outfit... how do the Sakura girls make it look so effortless?
skins.secretaryTouch: Helena was the one who drew the design on this paddle. Hehe, isn't it sweet?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander... even if it's the New Year's, people are going to stare...
